sentences.english: Because, that's the only way we can live with ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 因为，只有这样，我们才能堂堂正正的活下去。

sentences.english: Already the moon shone quite clear on the high ground on either side.
sentences.chinese: 月亮已经把两侧的高地照得亮堂堂的。

sentences.english: He was a handsome man still, kathleen adored him .

sentences.chinese: 在你的双唇，呼吸之所，印下堂堂正正的一吻。

The house was alight with candles.

sentences.english: He has always earned an honest living.

sentences.english: And who are the two noble portly figures accompanying her, now grown to man's estate?
